info.name: corona tilings / Heesch problem
info.description:
How many coronas can you do with one given tile ?
Could you place one more ? (answer: no. For this tile, Heesch number = 1 crown ).
Try by yourself here ! :-p → https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4clGW4
